content: मोघ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मह्-घ अच् वा कुत्वं] {@--1@} Vain, useless, fruitless, unprofitable, unsuccessful; याच्ञा मोया वरमधिगु णे नाधेमे लब्धकामा <ls>Me. 6</ls>; मोघवृत्ति कलभस्य चेष्टितं <ls>R. 11. 39</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 65</ls>; <ls>Bg. 9. 12.</ls> {@--2@} A imless, purposeless, indefinite. {@--3@} Left, abandoned {@--4@} Idle. --घः A fence, an enclosure, a hedge. --घा The trumpet flower --घं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} In vain, to no purpose, uselessly.
